layman_description: A dangerous barbed wire fence that deals damage to players who touch it.
technical_description: Base definition with barbed wire damage type and 1 damage value applied on contact.
player_impact: Creates lethal barrier for area denial and protection from players or zombies.

layman_description: A partially deteriorated barbed wire fence showing moderate wear and damage.
technical_description: Extends barbedFence with maxDamage 50 and downgrades to barbedFenceDamaged02 when destroyed.
player_impact: Represents degrading defensive structures requiring maintenance or replacement.

layman_description: A heavily deteriorated barbed wire fence showing severe wear and damage.
technical_description: Extends barbedFence with maxDamage 50 and drops scrap iron on destruction.
player_impact: Shows final stage of fence decay before total failure and resource reclamation.

layman_description: A flexible barbed wire surface that applies damaging effect to any contact.
technical_description: Standalone barbed wire definition with damage type and 1 damage value.
player_impact: Creates hazardous surface coating for barriers and defensive perimeter protection.

layman_description: A rotating barbed wire spool or coil used as a standalone defensive obstacle.
